title: Authors and Citation
text: Decunta F (2025). minter: Meta-analysis interactions. R package version 0.0.1, https://fdecunta.github.io/minter/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {minter: Meta-analysis of interactions},   author = {Facundo Decunta},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {https://fdecunta.github.io/minter/}, }

title: Meta-analysis of interactions
text: Helper functions conducting meta-analyses interactions 2×2 factorial experiments.

title: Meta-analysis of interactions
text: can install development version minter GitHub:
code: devtools::install_github("fdecunta/minter", force = TRUE)

what: This function should be the main API — compute_effsize
title: This function should be the main API — compute_effsize
text: Needs effect size:

title: This function should be the main API — compute_effsize
code: compute_effsize(   type,   effsize,   colname = c("yi", "vi"),   data,   Ctrl_mean,   Ctrl_sd,   Ctrl_n,   A_mean,   A_sd,   A_n,   B_mean,   B_sd,   B_n,   AB_mean,   AB_sd,   AB_n )

title: This function should be the main API — compute_effsize
text: type Type effect size: individual, main interaction effsize effect size compute: SMD, lnRR, lnVR lnCVR colname List two strings. Names output columns. default uses metafor: yi, vi. data Data frame data. Ctrl_mean Mean outcome Control treatment. Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control treatment. Ctrl_n Sample size control streatment. A_mean Mean outcome treatment. A_sd Standard deviation treatment. A_n Sample size treatment. B_mean Mean outcome B treatment. B_sd Standard deviation B treatment. B_n Sample size B treatment. AB_mean Mean outcome interaction AxB treatment. AB_sd Standard deviation interaction AxB treatment. AB_n Sample size interaction AxB treatment.
